detail_desc: Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with stand-up collar and lined hood with press-studs at the front and a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, an adjustable tab with press-studs at the sides, fleece-lined, zipped front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, concealed press-stud on one shoulder, seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Dance dress in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and a skirt in layers of glittery tulle. Lined gusset.
Wide trousers in twill with a high waist and belt, pleats at the top and zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
High-waisted leggings in imitation leather with an elasticated waist.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top and a small opening at the back. Lined.

Parka in a cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front and front pockets. Reversible sequin appliqué on one shoulder, concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and a decorative drawstring with a shimmering gold-coloured cord. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a cotton crêpe weave with a high waist with elasticated smocking and a raw-edge frill trim at the top. Lined.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Skirt in sequin-embroidered mesh with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, hood with a decorative drawstring, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with lots of volume. Elasticated waist. Lined.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton jersey with a kangaroo pocket and press-studs at the crotch.
Slip-on suede trainers with elastication and a decorative, sewn-on knot detail at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thick thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight, extra-long legs with raw-edge hems.

Wide-fitting jumper in a soft chenille knit with a gentle V-neck, unlined hood and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Cardigan in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Buttons down the front. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Ankle-length jeggings in stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Wide waist belt in imitation suede and grained imitation leather with a metal buckle and button stud fastening. Width approx. 6 cm.

Pyjama top and shorts in a soft, airy fine knit. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a small print motif above the hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative satin bow at the waist.
Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, relaxed style with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Double-breasted pea coat in a sturdy weave with side pockets, a tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.

Long, sleeveless jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps that tie at the back. Small opening at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Set with a cardigan and pair of trousers in lightweight, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Cardigan with press-studs down the front. Trousers with elastication at the back of the waist. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, high-waisted, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8x-12xY), a zip fly and narrow hems.

Single-breasted coat in recycled wool and recycled polyester with notch lapels. Chest pocket, diagonal welt side pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a wide, gathered neckline front and back and lace sections over the shoulders.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and a flare to the hem.
Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathered seam under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Vest top in soft slub jersey with a draped front, deep armholes and racer back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and gently rounded hems.
Pouch bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top, practical wrist strap and a small inner compartment. Size 17.5x23 cm.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.
Imitation leather clutch bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow imitation leather and metal chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x27 cm.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and reflective details.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an appliqué and print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Wide, longer-style jumper in a rib knit with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders with a silicone trim on the inside, long sleeves and a straight hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Small purse in woven fabric with a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Four card slots. Lined. Width 2 cm. Height 7 cm. Length 10.5 cm.
Small, sturdy, imitation leather shoulder bag with a quilted front, zip at the top and one small inner compartment. Strap in imitation leather and metal chain. Lined. Size 5x13x19.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Loafers in suede with pointed toes and tassels at the front. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Knot detail at the front and a metal fastener at the back.

Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a paper bag waist that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front and covered elastication at the back. Pleats at the front, a zip fly and a contrasting colour belt in a double layer of twill with metal D-rings. Back pockets, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal studs in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.7 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in sturdy stretch satin with a sheen, slim legs and a zip fly with a button.
Smocked skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Leggings in a fine-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside and an elasticated waist.

Set with a jacket and pair of joggers with side stripes. Jacket with long raglan sleeves, a zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Casual style joggers in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Poncho knitted in a soft viscose blend with a hole for the head and a draped effect on one shoulder.
Imitation suede ankle boots with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Thin metal chain necklaces with medallion and feather pendants and a trigger clasp. Length 47 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with an elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-on fabric belt at the front and straight, wide legs.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with front pockets and straps that cross and have adjustable fasteners at the back.
Sports shorts in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif, an elasticated waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. The polyester content of the shorts is recycled.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved, V-neck top in jersey with a wrapover top and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. Can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and organic cotton blend with a rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Tunic in woven fabric with a pleat at the front and bell-shaped hem. V-neck, dropped shoulders, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and a smocked seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Semi shiny stay-ups with a wide lace trim at the top and silicone on the inside. 20 denier.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
